original_text: Thus was he fair in his greatness, in the length of his branches: for his root was by great waters.
korean_text: 그 뿌리가 큰 물 가에 있으므로 그 나무가 크고 가지가 길어 모양이 아름다우매

sentences.original_text: Thus was he fair in his greatness
in the length of his branches
for his root was by great waters
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 뿌리가 큰 물가에 있었기 때문이다
